alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 1:00PM CDT until October 12 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 100 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roland in Pulaski County, or near Maumelle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Little Rock AFB... Vilonia... Mayflower... Gibson... Morgan... Olmstead... Roland in Pulaski County... Gravel Ridge... Marche... Saltillo... Macon... Otto... Cato... Palarm... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
